name: Draft Battle Arena
description: A neutral arena for draft mode battles between player and AI teams.

stageEffects.name: Draft Mode
stageEffects.description: Enhanced combat conditions for draft battles! All characters gain 40% more HP and mana, plus 30 HP regen and 25 mana regen per turn.

randomStageModifiers.name: Burning Ground
randomStageModifiers.description: The ground is ablaze with hellish flames! Player characters take fire damage at the start of each turn.

randomStageModifiers.name: Healing Wind
randomStageModifiers.description: A gentle breeze carries healing energy across the battlefield.

randomStageModifiers.name: It's raining man!
randomStageModifiers.description: Heavy rain falls from the burning sky! All player characters heal HP each turn.

randomStageModifiers.name: Frozen Ground
randomStageModifiers.description: The ground is frozen solid! All characters move 25% slower.

randomStageModifiers.name: Toxic Miasma
randomStageModifiers.description: Poisonous gas fills the air! All characters take poison damage each turn.

randomStageModifiers.name: Desert Heat
randomStageModifiers.description: The desert heat intensifies everyone's focus! All characters gain 50% critical strike chance, 50 HP regen, and 50 mana regen.

randomStageModifiers.name: Cleansing Winds
randomStageModifiers.description: Mystical winds sweep across the battlefield every 3rd turn, removing all buffs and debuffs from all characters.

randomStageModifiers.name: Small Space
randomStageModifiers.description: The confined space makes dodging impossible! All characters have their dodge chance reduced to 0.
